item.description: We are attending the Lizard Lounge Open Mic Challenge. The doors open at 7:30, the cost is $3 for performers and $5 for patrons. The show will start at 8 pm. This Open Mic fills up weeks in advance, so if you want to play, email Tom Bianchi, the host, to see if you can get a spot. His email is tom@24hourtom.com. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Call me at 857.492.6020 or look around for me with my small tan guitar case.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Open Mic Challenge
